response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you and represents an exceptional investment. I am offering you the chance to purchase it at a special price, reflecting its true worth and your appreciation for it. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic value of the product and your willingness to invest in it. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 1200000}
